detaileddescription.para: Install fatal handler with default options. This is meant to be easy to call from pyton via ctypes.

briefdescription.para: This is the signal handler from SEAL, adapted to build in Atlas, after the drop of that project.

simplesect.para: Oct, 2008 Search for `wlav' or `sss' to find changes from the SEAL version. I also dropped all ASSERT macro's in favor of assert.
